mapper.select: select a.*, e.writer_id from review_answer a join review e on e.review_no = a.review_no where review_answer_no = #{review_answer_no}
mapper.insert: insert into review_answer(review_no, review_answer_title, review_answer_content, a_writer_id, a_writer_name) values(#{review_no}, #{review_answer_title}, #{review_answer_content}, #{a_writer_id}, #{a_writer_name})
